---
title: "About this App"
output: html_document
---

This Shiny application allows to compare the Social Welfare rates of municipalities, districts and regions in the Canton of Zurich (Switzerland).

The social welfare rate was calculated as the proportion of welfare recipients of the total population in %. 

Source: Statistical Office Canton of Zurich, [opendata.swiss](https://opendata.swiss/de/dataset/sozialhilfequote)
